features: IMPROVED NOZZLE: New nozzle design distributes steam powerfully and consistently to remove stubborn wrinkles from clothing, drapery, furniture upholstery, bedding and table linens – Safe to use on all types of fabric
FAST-HEATING WATER TANK: Heats quickly to emit wrinkle-busting steam in 2 minutes – High-capacity, easy-fill water tank lasts for 10 minutes of continuous steaming
LIGHTWEIGHT & COMPACT: Compact design travels and stores easily - Includes auto shut-off safety protection if the unit gets too hot or too low on water
AUTOMATIC SHUT-OFF: Safety feature shuts off steamer automatically if the product gets too hot or too low on water

WHAT YOU GET: Garment steamer, user manual, industry-leading 5 Year Warranty, caring customer support 7 days a week, and the peace of mind that comes from a trusted brand with millions of customers worldwide.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PureSteam Portable Fabric Steamer Product Specifications: Size: 8″ x 5.5″ x 3.2″ | Weight: 1 lb | Cord Length: 8 ft | Steam Time: Up to 10 minutes

Design Forward The new nozzle design focuses the steam exactly where you need it to renew fabrics easily and quickly. Easily remove wrinkles, deodorize fabrics, and refresh clothes. Long-Reach Cord The 8-foot cord makes it the perfect tool for reviving wrinkled household furniture upholstery and drapes while still on the rod. Use on furniture, table linens, plush toys, and automobile interiors. Fast Heating PureSteam is so easy to use, all you need is water and an electrical outlet to begin steaming. Remove the top, add water, and in 2 minutes steam your favorite fabrics. Travel-Friendly Lightweight, compact, and portable for use when traveling and getting the wrinkles out of packed clothing. Use for flawless clothes before heading into the next business meeting, vacation, or wedding.

Steam and Sanitize Use the power of steam to help remove germs and bacteria in frequently used spaces like your car, furniture, and bathroom. Gentle on Fabrics Perfect for steaming all types of fabrics from suits, shirts, gowns, and dresses to silk, satin, wool, cotton, and other delicate materials. Dress to Impress When looking good is important, a quick steam to refresh your clothing is an easy and convenient way to make a great impression at work, on the go, or at a special event.

PureSteam Portable Fabric Steamer (White) PureSteam Portable Fabric Steamer (Black) PureSteam Pro Upright Clothes Steamer PureSteam XL Standing Fabric Steamer PureClean Steam Cleaner Size 8″ x 5.5″ x 3.2″ 8″ x 5.5″ x 3.2″ 13.7” x 8.9” x 11” 14” x 9.25” x 12.2” 15.75” x 11” x 13” Weight 1 lb 1 lb 9 lbs, 9 oz 10 lbs, 9 oz 10 lbs, 1 oz Tank Capacity 130 ml 130 ml 2 L 2 L 1.5 L Cord Length 8-feet 8-feet 7-feet 7-feet 16-feet Heating Time 2 minutes 2 minutes 45 seconds 45 seconds 8 minutes Steam Time Up to 10 minutes Up to 10 minutes Up to 60 minutes per tank refill on Level 4 Up to 60 minutes per tank refill Up to 45 minutes per tank refill Steam Levels 1 1 4 1 1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a handy little device to keep around in your closet for quick de-wrinkling!
reviews.reviewText: First of all it's a very compact, small little device, that's quickly and easily set up. The top twists on and off with a locking feature and is very secure while being very easy to twist. People with hand issues shouldn't have much trouble with removing the nozzle in order to fill it. The reservoir is small enough that it should fit under the faucet of your bathroom sink no problem. We have fairly shallow sinks and I was able to fill it without an issue. The opening is large and easily filled without spilling water all over the steamer. Do note, however, that due to it's very compact size you will only be able to put enough water in it to one garment at a time.The unit heats up quickly (under 2 minutes) and makes a little gurgling noise that will let you know that it's ready. There was not a lot of visible steam coming from it, but it steamed up the mirror above my vanity and I knew it was ready. Steaming was easy, though I did have to hold it very close, if not on the shirt. I was able to "press" a nice crease in the silk fabric very easily. Steaming the very bottom of the shirt was a little difficult just because it was hard to hold tension on it while it was hanging without burning my fingers from the steam. The steam is hot, however, I feel that it was a little conservative (likely to prevent people from burning themselves) I would have appreciated it being a little hotter, because it think it would have helped the process move a little more quickly. I did have to go over some more wrinkled areas a few times to get the wrinkles out. Overall, though, wrinkles came out of the shirt fairly quickly and very easily. Just a tip: Hold it very close, possibly touching the garment, for best results.Just know -- this is NOT an iron. You're of course going to get better results with an iron. But for materials that you don't want to risk scorching, or just because who wants to drag out the iron and ironing board at 5 in the morning, this is a great alternative. I was able to steam the wrinkles out of this silk shirt in about 2-3 minutes - way less than the time it would have taken me to set up an ironing board and iron. I also used this little steamer to fix a scrunched up tassel necklace. Worked super quickly (like 10 seconds) and my necklace is like brand new!All in all: A great little steamer. Super convenient to have on hand for quick de-wrinkling jobs. Works very well and will keep you from those lazy morning wrinkles. Tank is small (though on purpose) and steam is not as hot as I would like, perhaps, but is hot enough to press a crease in light fabrics such as silk. Great little addition to your clothing care arsenal!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect product for my use! A+
reviews.reviewText: I own a shop that sells vintage clothing and the garments are often made of quite delicate fabric. Dealing with vintage clothing, I prefer to launder all of our garments - which often leaves them very wrinkled. This is quite a dilemma because ironing delicate vintage pieces is simply not worth the risk!So far I’ve used this little powerhouse of a steamer on a very high quality 100% nylon jersey 1960’s maxi dress (the same fabric type used by iconic 1960’s designers such as Emilio Pucci), a 1950’s style floor length acetate blend ball gown with a very full skirt and an intricately embroidered 100% cotton 1970’s kaftan.Honestly, I could not possibly be more pleased with the results! I was very careful, spending quite a bit of time and attention steaming these pieces. Each of them came out perfectly without a wrinkle in sight - and I am not exaggerating! Per the directions I have and will continue using distilled water and while the capacity of the water tank isn’t very large, with a bottle of distilled water nearby refilling it quickly is easy as can be.Also, as the directions state, do not fill it past the marked maximum fill line - as it will spit out boiling hot water. If you do mistakenly overfill it - just put it on a towel for a minute or less and once it reaches the maximum fill line it will stop spitting out water. For my use it is the perfect size - small enough to discreetly store when it is not in use and though I do not travel frequently I imagine it would be great for that use as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worked well for a year and then started leaking
reviews.reviewText: I liked the size and portability of this product. It could be just my product, but it started leaking after a year. It still works, but it's always leaking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effortless Wrinkle Removal and Wedding Wardrobe Savior - A Must-Have Handheld Steamer!
reviews.reviewText: I had the pleasure of gifting my friend this handheld steamer from their wedding registry, and it has proven to be an absolute game-changer for their newlywed life. This compact and powerful steamer has revolutionized their garment care routine, effortlessly removing wrinkles and ensuring they look their best for every occasion.The steamer's user-friendly design adds to its appeal. Its lightweight construction and ergonomic handle make it comfortable to hold and navigate, even during longer steaming sessions.Additionally, the steamer's portability makes it a travel essential. Its compact size easily fits into suitcases or carry-on bags, allowing my friend to maintain a polished appearance while on their honeymoon or any future trips.If you're searching for a practical and thoughtful wedding gift, this handheld steamer is an absolute winner. Its exceptional performance, user-friendly design, versatility, and travel-friendly features make it an essential tool for maintaining a wrinkle-free wardrobe and looking your best on any occasion.
This is a terrific product. Removes creases as effectively as a large floor stand model (just takes a little longer because the nozzle is not as wide). Small enough to throw in a suitcase.
Works great, very happy with it

Tuve un evento y no tenia una plancha, se me ocurrió comprar este producto por las reseñas llegó en un dia! y debo confesar que funciona y muy bien!!! es super pequeño super facil de usar y quita arrugas que es lo mas importante, tarda mucho menos de lo que dice en sacar el vapor, es casi inmediato funciona muy bien, y la puedes llevar a cualquier lugar a cualquier viaje y por el precio creo que vale mucha la pena!
Es compacta y muy práctica para usar
